# XmlTypes.ToXDocument method

Takes an `XmlDocument` in and returns an equivalent `XDocument`.

```csharp
public static XDocument ToXDocument(XmlDocument xmlDocument)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| xmlDocument | The input document |

## Return Value
